definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: home of Abimelek (Thes Add sub [[ארם]]) Ju Jdg 9:41 [[בָּארוּמָה]], prob. = [[רוּמָה]] 2Ki 23:36, cf. Jer Lag:Onomast. 146, 2nd ed. 178. It must have lain near Shechem; identified by MV al. with El ‘Ormah, 2 hours SE. from Shechem (van de Velde:Reisen ii. 268), but this place not otherwise known; cf. Survey:ii. 387.
